description:
The 3 day ,step-by-step system for transforming your existing knowledge into a high-value, self-selling nonfiction book

Discover strategies like..

  • "Spectrum Pulse" Technique - Stand-up comedian's trick for turning broken English into "engaging content"
  • Quote-n-flip - Simple, first-time-authors' technique for having authority without any credentials
  • How to "spin" average content into insightful, unique content that stands out in the market
  • Inexpensive, highly-skilled freelance editor - Screening and hiring step-by-Step
  • How to make your book IMPACT people, instead of it being just "another book"
  • The 4 point reference - Checklist for identifying your profitable, personally-tailored book niche
  • How to compose a "sales-letter" style table-of-contents to create "intrigue" and boost sales


Also, learn about the speed-writing techniques like..

  • "Margin Locking Method" - TV show Producers' filming protocol that ensures project completion (And how you can use it to complete your book)
  • "Artisanal work up front" - For streamlining content creation
  • "90/15/90/30 Pulse" for marathon writing
  • How to "Sprint-write" to double your per-hour word count
  • And more!
See you inside the course!
title: 3 Day Nonfiction Book System - Nonfiction E-book Writing
